description:
The Nishizawa Christmas party looks to be spoiled by a sudden blizzard in Inner-Tokyo that turns into ice age-conditions. Can Fuyuki and Geroro find the culprit before this white Christmas becomes a whiteout?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Central Tokyo`s Ice Age / Arisa Has Come
ケロロ 奥東京氷河期 アリサが来た!
